mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.zyjsjbdm AS "rankCode", a.zyjsjbmc AS "rankName", a.gwdj AS "rankTitle", a.gjzyjsgwjb AS "rankSection"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_professionaltechnical_c a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ${dataScope}
AND a.zyjsjbdm LIKE '%'||#{rankCode}||'%' '%'+#{rankCode}+'%' concat('%',#{rankCode},'%')
AND a.zyjsjbmc LIKE '%'||#{rankName}||'%' '%'+#{rankName}+'%' concat('%',#{rankName},'%')
AND a.gwdj LIKE '%'||#{rankTitle}||'%' '%'+#{rankTitle}+'%' concat('%',#{rankTitle},'%')
AND a.gjzyjsgwjb LIKE '%'||#{rankSection}||'%' '%'+#{rankSection}+'%' concat('%',#{rankSection},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_professionaltechnical_c( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, zyjsjbdm, zyjsjbmc, gwdj, gjzyjsgwjb ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{rankCode}, #{rankName}, #{rankTitle}, #{rankSection} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_professionaltechnical_c SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, zyjsjbdm = #{rankCode}, zyjsjbmc = #{rankName}, gwdj = #{rankTitle}, gjzyjsgwjb = #{rankSection} WHERE id = #{id}
